description:
Series Status: In progress

01. Invasion of the Moonmen: Aliens invade Earth!
02. Rockets of the Moonmen: Take the fight to them!
03. Secrets of the Moonmen: Discover the mysteries of space!

The Download link includes all of the adventures in one zip file. The adventures are HTML files and will launch in a web browser when opened.
